name: Azure Cosmos DB
semantic_context: Interact with Azure Cosmos DB API
natural_language_description: 这是 Azure Cosmos DB 节点。主要用于: Interact with Azure Cosmos DB API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: container

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a new item
Delete (值: delete) - Delete an existing item
Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve a list of items
Update (值: update) - Update an existing item

containerCreate.name: containerCreate
containerCreate.description: Unique identifier for the new container
containerCreate.natural_language_description: 参数名: ID | 作用: Unique identifier for the new container | (必填项)

partitionKey.name: partitionKey
partitionKey.description: The partition key is used to automatically distribute data across partitions for scalability. Choose a property in your JSON document that has a wide range of values and evenly distributes request volume.

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}

container.name: container
container.description: Select the container you want to use
container.natural_language_description: 参数名: Container | 作用: Select the container you want to use | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

customProperties.name: customProperties
customProperties.description: The item contents as a JSON object
customProperties.natural_language_description: 参数名: Item Contents | 作用: The item contents as a JSON object | 默认值: {} | (必填项)

item.name: item
item.description: Select the item to be updated
item.natural_language_description: 参数名: Item | 作用: Select the item to be updated | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

query.name: query
query.description: The SQL query to execute. Use $1, $2, $3, etc., to reference the 'Query Parameters' set in the options below.
query.natural_language_description: 参数名: Query | 作用: The SQL query to execute. Use $1, $2, $3, etc., to reference the 'Query Parameters' set in the options below. | 提示: Consider using query parameters to prevent SQL injection attacks. Add them in the options below. | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}

requestOptions.name: requestOptions
requestOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Request Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: allowUnauthorizedCerts (值: None) - Whether to accept the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible
proxy (值: None) - HTTP proxy to use. If authentication is required it can be defined as follow: http://username:password@myproxy:3128
timeout (值: None) - Time in ms to wait for the server to send response headers (and start the response body) before aborting the request
